thread.title: PERALTA/RIZA MAE MARTINEZ
thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 6000+ reviewed by PERALTA/RIZA MAE MARTINEZ

author: PERALTA/RIZA MAE MARTINEZ
title: PERALTA/RIZA MAE MARTINEZ
text: This is my second time purchasing a ticket from you guys and the service from the travel agents was always great.The only downside that I can honestly say is dealing with the Billing Department to confirm my payment.We as a customer should have the priviledge to contact you guys to confirm our payment on a time that is convenient for us and not the other way around
